activities:
Ning is a technology platform for creating custom social networks. In order to create a social network on the Ning platform, an individual (the "Network Creator") must register for account credentials. When registering for account credentials, Ning collects certain personal information from the Network Creator, including a name, email address, and a password. In addition, Network Creators must provide their credit card or other payment instrument information and telephone number (for customer support purposes).
 
Those who sign up to become a member of a social network created on the Ning platform ("members") provide certain personal information to that social network's Network Creator. Such Network Creator (and its designated administrators, if applicable) will have access to all personal information and data collected from a social network or member, which includes registration information, profile data, answers to profile questions designated by the Network Creator, content and other information contributed by members and certain analytics relating to usage and interactions within the social network.
corpofftitle1: Senior Director, Business and Legal Affairs
